title: RemoteOK Scraper input
description: Scraper that can scrape job listing from RemoteOK site

tag.title: Tag
tag.description: Tag for which we scraper will search job listings on RemoteOK site (java, node, etc.)

maxNumberOfListings.title: Number of results
maxNumberOfListings.description: Limit the amount of results you want. Higher limits will take longer to scrape.

proxyConfiguration.title: Proxy configuration
proxyConfiguration.description: Use Apify Proxy or your custom Proxy.

maxConcurrency.title: Max concurrency
maxConcurrency.description: Defines how many pages can be processed by the scraper in parallel. The scraper automatically increases and decreases concurrency based on available system resources. Use this option to set a hard limit.
